work-gdmcom.statement1: Working student in the Information and Communication Technology department
work-gdmcom.statement2: Automation of recurring tasks in the domain of Microsoft Office Suite and file storages
work-gdmcom.statement3: Implementing a prototype for the automated creation of an overview of business locations from file directories

work-ipoque-intern.statement1: Creation of generic Angular components to display UI-components in a showcase
work-ipoque-intern.statement2: Implementing the components with variable configuration patterns for user-defined control of the resulting visualization
work-ipoque-intern.statement3: Automated rendering of various form elements based on a custom configuration

work-ipoque-bachelor.statement1: Conception, design and implementation of a domain-specific language for the creation of component source code
work-ipoque-bachelor.statement2: Designing and implementing a compiler for a custom programming language
work-ipoque-bachelor.statement3: Generation of generic Angular source code and own solution approaches using design patterns (modularization, dependency injection, etc.)

work-ipoque-working-student.statement1: Further development of the DSL and the associated compiler with implementation of plugins for various IDEs
work-ipoque-working-student.statement2: Development of internal automation scripts for the continuous delivery pipeline
work-ipoque-working-student.statement3: Development of unit tests for all modules of the compiler
